Description:
<0>GetVolume - retrieves the current volume for this sound buffer.
<1>HRESULT IDirectSoundBuffer::GetVolume(
<3/><1>LONG* <2>Volume
<1>);
<2>Volume - pointer to a variable to contain the volume associated with the specified DirectSound buffer.

<0>SetVolume - changes the volume of a sound buffer.
<1>HRESULT IDirectSoundBuffer::SetVolume(
<3/><1>LONG <2>Volume
<1>);
<2>Volume - new volume requested for this sound buffer. Allowable values are between <2>DSBVOLUME_MAX(0) and <2>DSBVOLUME_MIN(-10000)
Name: Attenuation
